body_html:
The discussion we've been having was mostly in the chats of core dev team. There are a few concrete proposals but we haven't decided what should we go with yet. As said before I really liked this PR, but in the light of what we talked about, we're thinking of an alternative way of solving the same problem, so I'm not sure if we'll be merging this. We'll try to publish some plans soon.

NB our dtypes are only "partially" device bound - they know you want a CUDA tensor, but not on which device exactly, so we're in this inconsistent half state. We're trying to clean this up.

body:
The discussion we've been having was mostly in the chats of core dev team. There are a few concrete proposals but we haven't decided what should we go with yet. As said before I really liked this PR, but in the light of what we talked about, we're thinking of an alternative way of solving the same problem, so I'm not sure if we'll be merging this. We'll try to publish some plans soon.

NB our `dtypes` are only "partially" device bound - they know you want a CUDA tensor, but not on which device exactly, so we're in this inconsistent half state. We're trying to clean this up.
